German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From ein- +‎ steigen

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʔaɪ̯nʃtaɪ̯ɡŋ̩/, /ˈʔaɪ̯nʃtaɪ̯ɡən/

Verb[edit]

einsteigen (class 1 strong, third-person singular simple present steigt ein, past tense stieg ein, past participle eingestiegen, past subjunctive stiege ein, auxiliary sein)

  1. to get in
  2. to get on
